main event: Several bright green objects with long tails were reported moving rapidly across the sky in the Ohio-Indiana area on January 3, 1962.
interesting points: The sightings lasted between 1 to 6 seconds and occurred over a period of 1 to 2 minutes at night., Witnesses described the objects as very bright and fiery in appearance., A total of more than 30 reports of similar sightings were received from various areas in Ohio and Indiana., A questionnaire used by the U.S. Air Force requested witnesses to detail their observations, providing valuable data for analysis., The conclusion from Project Blue Book suggested that some of the objects observed appeared to be meteors, specifically from the Quadrantids meteor shower.
sighted object: bright green objects with long tails
